markdown:
A chouchin-obake takes the shape of a paper lantern with a horizontal split near the bottom from which a long tongue protrudes. Upon closer inspection, two eyes appear above the split mouth. Chouchin-obake are anomalous in that they don't awaken in the same way other tsukumogami do. Paper lanterns are nearly impossible to maintain for long enough to spawn tsukumogami. Instead, a chouchin-obake is a kind of fire [kami](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=243) that takes the form of a lantern's flame and inhabits a paper lantern when they manifest. [Chouchin-Obake](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1351) **Source** [Bestiary 3](/Sources.aspx?ID=66) pg. 277 **Perception** +15 **Languages** [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1) **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +12, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +10, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +16 **Str** +2 **Dex** +4 **Con** +4 **Int** +3 **Wis** +5 **Cha** +0 --- **AC** 24 **Fort** +12 **Ref** +16 **Will** +15 **HP** 75 **Immunities** bleed, [death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [doomed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=9), [drained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=10), [fatigued](/Conditions.aspx?ID=15), [healing](/Traits.aspx?ID=89), [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38) **Resistances** physical 5 **Lifewick Candle** ([aura](/Traits.aspx?ID=206), [divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117), [negative](/Traits.aspx?ID=118)) 15 feet. A ghostly blue flame within the chouchin-obake draws upon the life-force of the living to sustain themself. At the start of the chouchin-obake's turn, each creature in the aura takes 2d6 negative damage (DC 26 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Fortitude save). The chouchinobake regains an amount of Hit Points equal to the amount of damage taken by the single creature that took the most damage.
**Shadowbind** **Trigger** A creature attempts to leave the chouchinobake's Lifewick Candle aura during a [move](/Traits.aspx?ID=114) action; **Effect** The chouchin-obake attempts to bind the creature using their own shadow. The triggering creature must succeed at a DC 26 Reflex save or become [immobilized](/Conditions.aspx?ID=24) until its next turn. --- **Speed** fly 20 feet **Melee** tendril +16 ([Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [reach 15 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 2d8 negative plus 2d6 fire plus [Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=18) **Ranged** flame +16 ([range increment 30 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248)), **Damage** 2d4 negative plus 2d6 fire **[Constrict](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=10)** 2d8 negative plus 1d6 fire, DC 26
